[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]

[00:00.69]BOSS (Explicit) - The Carters
[00:01.29]Lyricist：Beyoncé/S. Carter/Tyrone "Ty Dolla $ign" Griffin Jr./Dernst "D'Mile" Emile II
[00:01.79]Composer：Beyoncé/S. Carter/Tyrone "Ty Dolla $ign" Griffin Jr./Dernst "D'Mile" Emile II
[00:03.04]Beyoncé：
[00:08.01]Ain't nothing to it real one
[00:11.39]Ain't nothing to it boss
[00:14.68]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it real one
[00:18.25]Ain't nothing to it there's nothing boss
[00:20.62]Beyoncé：
[00:23.10]I pay the cost who 'gon take it off take it off
[00:29.02]I record then I ball then I ball I ignored a lot of calls click click
[00:34.94]You ain't talking about nothing I ain't got no time
[00:39.17]Got that dinero on my mind
[00:41.61]Ooh I got real problems just like you b**ch
[00:46.30]Tell that b**ch I don't like you I don't f**k with you
[00:48.88]Beyoncé：
[00:49.06]Ain't nothing to it real one
[00:52.27]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it boss
[00:55.89]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it real one
[00:59.30]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it I boss
[01:02.35]Ooh real one uh I'm a boss
[01:09.59]JAY-Z/Beyoncé：
[01:12.66]Let me get 'em Bey
[01:15.77]Hundred million crib three million watch all facts
[01:19.46]No cap false n**ga you not a boss you got a boss
[01:22.82]N**gas getting jerked that sh*t hurts I take it personally
[01:26.12]N**gas rather work for the man than to work with me
[01:29.59]Just so they can pretend they on my level that sh*t is irkin' to me
[01:33.11]Pride always goeth before the fall almost certainly
[01:37.74]It's disturbing what I gross what I gross
[01:41.11]Survey says you not even close not even close
[01:42.75]Everybody's bosses 'til it's time to pay for the office
[01:46.47]'Til them invoices separate the men from the boys over here
[01:50.23]We measure success by how many people successful next to you
[01:53.45]Here we say you broke if everybody gets broke except for you
[01:56.71]Boss
[01:57.22]Beyoncé：
[01:57.45]Ain't nothing to it real one real one
[02:01.12]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it boss boss boss boss
[02:04.42]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it real one real one
[02:07.90]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it I boss
[02:11.15]Ooh real one I'm a boss oh yeah
[02:24.79]Beyoncé：
[02:25.13]Ain't nothing to it I boss so I bought my momma a whip
[02:28.04]My great-great-grandchildren already rich
[02:31.62]That's a lot of brown chi'r'en on your Forbes list
[02:35.00]Probably looking around my compound on my fortress boss
[02:39.19]I be ridin' around with my seat reclining
[02:42.35]Droppin' my daughter off at school every morning
[02:45.91]We slammin' car doors I be true balling on these bum whores
[02:52.35]You ain't talking about nothing I ain't got no time boss
[02:58.99]Chill tell them paps they gotta relax you tried it
[03:02.88]Toes in the sand momma gettin' fat stacks
[03:05.94]Beyoncé：
[03:06.39]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it real one real one
[03:09.80]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it boss boss
[03:13.10]Ain't nothing to it nothin' to it real one real one
[03:16.56]Ain't nothing to it I boss
[03:19.57]Ooh real one I'm a boss oh yeah
[03:32.96]Beyoncé/Blue Ivy：
[03:47.48]Ooh ooh I'm a boss
[04:00.80]Shout out to Rumi and Sir love Blue
data.trans:
[ti:BOSS (Explicit)]
[ar:The Carters]
[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.69]//
[00:01.29]//
[00:01.79]//
[00:03.04]//
[00:08.01]没什么大不了的 说真的
[00:11.39]没什么大不了的 老板
[00:14.68]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的  说真的
[00:18.25]没什么大不了的 没什么 老板
[00:20.62]//
[00:23.10]我来结账 谁要脱衣服
[00:29.02]我记录下来 然后开始狂欢 我拒接了很多电话 
[00:34.94]你什么都没说 我没时间了
[00:39.17]把钱装进我的脑子里
[00:41.61]我和你们这些碧池遇到了一样的问题
[00:46.30]告诉那个碧池 我不喜欢你 我不想跟你玩
[00:48.88]//
[00:49.06]没什么大不了的 说真的
[00:52.27]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 老板
[00:55.89]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 说真的
[00:59.30]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 我是老板
[01:02.35]说真的 我是老板
[01:09.59]//
[01:12.66]让我来搞定他们 碧昂丝
[01:15.77]价值上亿的豪宅 三百万美元的手表 这些都是事实
[01:19.46]没有警察 错了 伙计 你不是老板 你上头还有人
[01:22.82]那小子被揍了 看起来很疼 我亲自干的
[01:26.12]他宁愿给别人卖力 也不愿当我手下
[01:29.59]还以为这样 他们就能假装有我的水平 这件事让我很苦恼
[01:33.11]骄兵必败
[01:37.74]我的巨额收入让我很烦恼
[01:41.11]调查显示 你根本不让人接近
[01:42.75]人人都可以自称是老板 等到付办公室租金的时候就怂了
[01:46.47]直到发票把男人从男孩之中区分开来
[01:50.23]我们衡量成功的标准是 你身边有多少成功的人
[01:53.45]要是你身边的人除了你很穷 那我们会说 你也是个穷鬼
[01:56.71]老板
[01:57.22]//
[01:57.45]没什么大不了的 说真的 说真的
[02:01.12]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 老板 老板 老板 老板
[02:04.42]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 说真的 说真的
[02:07.90]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 我是老板
[02:11.15]说真的 我是老板
[02:24.79]//
[02:25.13]没什么大不了的 我是老板 所以我给我妈妈买了一辆豪车
[02:28.04]我的子孙后代都会是富人
[02:31.62]福布斯富豪榜上将会有很多黑种人
[02:35.00]他们可能会在我的屋子里转来转去 老板
[02:39.19]我会斜躺在座椅上 开着车到处兜风
[02:42.35]每天早上开车把我女儿送到学校
[02:45.91]我们关上车门 我真的跟这些碧池们一起狂欢
[02:52.35]你什么都没说 我没时间了 老板
[02:58.99]冷静 告诉狗仔队们 他们也该休息一下了 你试过了
[03:02.88]脚趾踩在沙子里 妈妈赚钱很多
[03:05.94]//
[03:06.39]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 说真的 说真的
[03:09.80]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 老板 老板
[03:13.10]没什么大不了的 没什么大不了的 说真的 说真的
[03:16.56]没什么大不了的 我是老板
[03:19.57]说真的 我是老板
[03:32.96]//
[03:47.48]我是老板
[04:00.80]向鲁米和西尔大喊 我爱布鲁·艾薇
